title: Amazon Fire 7-inch: How much tablet does £50 get you?
text:
Amazon Fire 7-inch: How much tablet does £50 get you? 
Published By: AndroidCentral.com - Today 
Amazon may have flopped when it came to launching a smartphone, but its tablets have been far more successful. We're now several iterations ...
